name: Violet
description:
Violet was made in 2013 for the Bacon Game Jam 06, where the theme was rainbows.

The game was made in 48 hours and is very unpolished, but is filled with some interesting challenges and a narrative that progresses as you do.

You can also use the mouse to click on the rainbow.

If you need to skip a level, you can press numpad 0.

You can also find an old video of me playing through the game, with some very basic commentary.

Additionally, here is the narrative in plain text.
